final_messages.Triumph: 🏁 Zoom! You blazed past the finish line!
final_messages.TimeOut: ⛽ Out of gas! The race is over.
final_messages.Interrupted: 🛑 Race halted! Pit crew pulled you out.
final_messages.Defeat: 🚓 Busted! The cops caught up with you!

final_messages.Triumph: 🏰 Triumph! The dragon reigns over the realm!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🧪 Ran out of magic! The quest fades...
final_messages.Interrupted: 👹 Cursed! The quest was halted by dark magic.
final_messages.Defeat: 🧛 Ambushed! A vampire slayed the dragon!

final_messages.Triumph: 🏝️ Aye aye! You discovered the hidden island!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🐠 Out of energy... lost in the current.
final_messages.Interrupted: ⛈️ Voyage cut short by stormy seas.
final_messages.Defeat: 🐙 Tangled! A giant octopus dragged you down!

final_messages.Triumph: 🌌 Stellar success! You reached the stars!
final_messages.Interrupted: 🕳️ Pulled into a black hole! The mission was consumed by gravity.

final_messages.Triumph: 💰 Treasure secured! You sailed to fortune!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🍗 Supplies ran out! The wind left your sails...
final_messages.Interrupted: 💀 Surrendered! A surprise raid halted your adventure.
final_messages.Defeat: 🦈 Overboard! The shark claimed its prize.

final_messages.Triumph: 🏕️ Oasis reached! You survived the sands!
final_messages.TimeOut: 💧 Parched! You ran out of water...
final_messages.Defeat: 🐍 Bitten! The desert claimed its traveler.

final_messages.Triumph: 📱 Upload complete! You hacked the system!
final_messages.Interrupted: 🩻 Code flipped! You got hacked instead!
final_messages.Defeat: 🕷️ Traced! ICE program fried your code.

final_messages.Triumph: 🏡 Safe in your burrow! You made it home!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🍯 Ran out of energy before nightfall...
final_messages.Defeat: 🦉 Hunted! The owl snatched you from above!

final_messages.Triumph: 📜 Case closed! The final clue cracked it all.
final_messages.TimeOut: 🕰️ Time’s up! The criminal vanished without a trace.
final_messages.Interrupted: 🧨 Boom! You walked right into a trap.
final_messages.Defeat: 🕴️ Outwitted! The mastermind got away this time.

final_messages.Triumph: 🛏️ You banished the spirit and found a safe room!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🕯️ The candle burned out... lost in the dark.
final_messages.Interrupted: 👻 A wailing ghost shattered your focus.
final_messages.Defeat: 💀 Possessed! The mansion claimed your soul.

final_messages.Interrupted: 🔥 Fire in the kitchen! Chaos erupted!

final_messages.Triumph: ⛩️ Mission complete! You slipped through the sacred gate undetected.
final_messages.TimeOut: 🌘 Night fades... your stealth mission failed.
final_messages.Interrupted: 💥 Ambush! Your cover was blown mid-mission.
final_messages.Defeat: 🐉 Defeated by the guardian dragon! Your stealth was no match for ancient fire.

final_messages.Triumph: ⛩️ The warrior has passed through the sacred gate — honor is restored.
final_messages.TimeOut: 🌄 Dusk falls... your path of honor was incomplete.
final_messages.Interrupted: ⚔️ Interrupted! You were challenged before your journey's end.
final_messages.Defeat: 👹 Fallen! A demon warrior has defeated you.

final_messages.Triumph: 🌳 Survival! You reached the safety of the jungle!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🥚 Too late! The nest was abandoned...
final_messages.Interrupted: 🌋 Volcanic rumble! Your journey was cut short.
final_messages.Defeat: 🦖 Ambushed! A predator took you down.

final_messages.Triumph: 🏔️ You braved the freeze and reached the icy peak!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🥶 Frozen! The cold claimed you before you arrived.
final_messages.Interrupted: ❄️ Avalanche! Your trek was buried in snow.
final_messages.Defeat: 🐅 Hunted! The saber-tooth pounced in the blizzard.

final_messages.Triumph: 🏚️ Safehouse reached! You escaped the horde!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🧠 Out of brains... you couldn’t keep going.
final_messages.Interrupted: 🚨 Sirens blared! You had to reroute.

final_messages.Triumph: ⚱️ The tomb is unlocked! Ancient treasure is yours!
final_messages.TimeOut: 🏺 Time ran out... the sands reclaimed the path.
final_messages.Interrupted: 🪔 Torch flickered out — your expedition failed.
final_messages.Defeat: 🧟‍♀️ Cursed! The mummy rose and claimed your soul.
